steps.conclusion: Some course titles are arguably too narrow or not standard canonical fields (e.g., “CSS Design” and “Accessibility” as standalone field names, and “User Experience” without “Design”).

Use more established field names (e.g., “Cascading Style Sheets” or “CSS Development,” “Accessibility Engineering,” “User Experience Design”) and consider adding a broader foundational course like “Computer Science” or “Software Engineering” for deeper context.
